  • Deuteronomy 34
1 The priests the Levites, even all the tribe of Levi, shall have no portion nor inheritance with Israel; they shall eat the offerings of the Domina made by fire, and Her inheritance. 2 And they shall have no inheritance among their sisters; the Domina is their inheritance, as She hath spoken unto them.   3 And this shall be the priests' due from the people, from them that offer a sacrifice, whether it be ox or sheep, that they shall give unto the priestess the shoulder, and the two cheeks, and the maw. 4 The first-fruits of thy corn, of thy wine, and of thine oil, and the first of the fleece of thy sheep, shalt thou give her. 5 For the Domina thy God hath chosen her out of all thy tribes, to stand to minister in the name of the Domina, her and her daughters for ever.   6 And if a Levite come from any of thy gates out of all Israel, where she sojourneth, and come with all the desire of her soul unto the place which the Domina shall choose; 7 then she shall minister in the name of the Domina her God, as all her sisters the Levites do, who stand there before the Domina. 8 They shall have like portions to eat, beside that which is her due according to the mothers' houses.   9 When thou art come into the land which the Domina thy God giveth thee, thou shalt not learn to do after the abominations of those nations. 10 There shall not be found among you any one that maketh her daughter or her son to pass through the fire, one that useth divination, a soothsayer, or an enchanter, or a sorcerer, 11 or a charmer, or one that consulteth a ghost or a familiar spirit, or a necromancer.
12 For whosoever doeth these things is an abomination unto the Domina; and because of these abominations the Domina thy God is driving them out from before thee. 13 Thou shalt be whole-hearted with the Domina thy God. 14 For these nations, that thou art to dispossess, hearken unto soothsayers, and unto diviners; but as for thee, the Domina thy God hath not suffered thee so to do. 15 A prophetess will the Domina thy God raise up unto thee, from the midst of thee, of thy sisters, like unto me; unto her ye shall hearken; 16 according to all that thou didst desire of the Domina thy God in Horeb in the day of the assembly, saying: 'Let me not hear again the voice of the Domina my God, neither let me see this great fire any more, that I die not.' 17 And the Domina said unto me: 'They have well said that which they have spoken. 18 I will raise them up a prophetess from among their sisters, like unto thee; and I will put My words in her mouth, and she shall speak unto them all that I shall command her. 19 And it shall come to pass, that whosoever will not hearken unto My words which she shall speak in My name, I will require it of her. 20 But the prophetess, that shall speak a word presumptuously in My name, which I have not commanded her to speak, or that shall speak in the name of other gods, that same prophetess shall die.' 21 And if thou say in thy heart: 'How shall we know the word which the Domina hath not spoken?' 22 When a prophetess speaketh in the name of the Domina, if the thing follow not, nor come to pass, that is the thing which the Domina hath not spoken; the prophetess hath spoken it presumptuously, thou shalt not be afraid of her.
